c:\go\path\src\issue5986>type linkerror.go
package main

/*
#cgo LDFLAGS: -lm -lmingwex
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>

void output()
{
    int current_row = 0, row_count = 0;
    double sum_squares = 0;
    do {
        if (current_row == 10) {
            current_row = 0;
        }
        ++row_count;
    }
    while (current_row++ != 1);
    double d = sqrt(sum_squares / row_count);
    printf("sqrt is: %g\n", d);
}
*/
import "C"

func main() {
    C.output();
}
